name: computer-management-system
description: This project aims to create a web application to manage and monitor computers in a company, organized by rooms, with the ability to send commands (via WebSocket), monitor real-time status (online/offline determined through WS, %CPU/%RAM sent by Agent via HTTP), display visual positioning, user permission system (Admin, User), secure Agent registration mechanism (MFA/Token), computer error reporting and handling functions, and data filtering capabilities on list APIs. The Agent will be developed using Python.

scripts.install: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
